file.name: contract.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  version: "1"
  title: Payment Gateway API
  description: Payment Gateway API

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5270
    description: "Local environment API Server"

tags:
  - name: Payments
    description: Request cards payments

# security:
#   - BearerAuth: []

paths:
  /payments:
    post:
      description: Requests a card payment
      tags:
        - Payments
      #parameters:
        #- $ref: '#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKey'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentRequest'
            example:
              amount: 1526963
              currency: 'EUR'
              card:
                type: 'visa'
                holder_name: 'Test'
                number: '4242424242424242'
                expire_month: 10
                expire_year: 2025
                cvv: 100
                
      responses:
        202:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/PaymentRequest_201'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
#        409:
#          $ref: '#/components/responses/Conflict'
        415:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InvalidMediaType'
        422:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnprocessableEntity'
        5XX:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ServerError'
  
  /payments/{payment-id}:
    get:
      description: Retrieves a payment
      tags:
        - Payments
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentID'
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/GetPayment_200'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
        415:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InvalidMediaType'
        422:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnprocessableEntity'
        5XX:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ServerError'

components:
  # securitySchemes:
  #   BearerAuth:
  #     type: http
  #     scheme: bearer
  
  parameters:
    PaymentID:
      name: payment-id
      in: path
      description: A payment identifier
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string

    # IdempotencyKey:
    #   name: Idempotency-Key
    #   description: | 
    #     An idempotency key for safely retrying requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. 
    #     [Idempotency Header](https://tools.ietf.org/id/draft-idempotency-header-01.html)
    #   in: header
    #   required: false
    #   schema:
    #     type: string

  responses:
    
    PaymentRequest_201:
      description: Success
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentRequest_201'
          examples:
            payment_request:
              $ref: '#/components/examples/PaymentRequest_201'

    GetPayment_200:
      description: Success
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetPayment_200'
          examples:
            payment_request:
              $ref: '#/components/examples/GetPayment_200'
                
    BadRequest:
      description: Invalid request parameters.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails'

    NotFound:
      description: An account number with the specified ID was not found.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails'

    ServerError:
      description: Unexpected error.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails'

    Conflict:
      description: The current idempotent request is being processed
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails'

    InvalidMediaType:
      description: Invalid media type was specified in the `Accept` header (should be `application/json` or `application/hal+json`).

    UnprocessableEntity:
      description: Invalid fields
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails'
  
  schemas:

    PaymentRequest_201:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
    
    GetPayment_200:
      type: object
      properties: 
        amount:
          type: integer
          nullable: false
        currency:
          type: string
          description: Three-letter payment [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html), in lowercase.
          enum:
            - EUR
            - USD
          nullable: false
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
            - pending
            - approved
            - declined
          nullable: false
        processed_on:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        card:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentRequestCard'
          
    PaymentRequest:
      type: object
      properties: 
        amount:
          type: integer
          nullable: false
        currency:
          type: string
          description: Three-letter payment [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html), in lowercase.
          enum:
            - EUR
            - USD
          nullable: false
        card:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentRequestCard'
          
    PaymentRequestCard:
      type: object
      properties: 
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - visa
            - mastercard
          nullable: false
        holder_name:
          type: string
          nullable: false
        number:
          type: string
          nullable: false
        expire_month:
          type: integer
          nullable: false
        expire_year:
          type: integer
          nullable: false
        cvv:
          type: integer
          nullable: false
          
    ProblemDetails:
      type: object
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        status:
          type: integer
        detail:
          type: string
        instance:
          type: string
        extensions:
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: object
            additionalProperties: true
      additionalProperties:
        type: object
        additionalProperties: true
  
  examples:
    
    PaymentRequest_201:
      value:
        id: '573bc1cd-8dc0-4b6f-a33b-3d79fdf58fa3'
        status: 'approved'
    
    GetPayment_200:
      value:
        amount: 1526963
        currency: 'EUR'
        status: 'declined'
        processed_on: '2022-04-09T23:07:22Z'
        card:
          type: 'visa'
          holder_name: 'Test'
          number: '4242############'
          expire_month: 10
          expire_year: 2025
          cvv: 100
          
    PaymentRequest:
      value:
        amount: 1526963
        currency: 'EUR'
        card:
          type: 'visa'
          holder_name: 'Test'
          number: '4242424242424242'
          expire_month: 10
          expire_year: 2025
          cvv: 100

Error: notImplemented: path "/payments": post: responses: HTTP code pattern not implemented
